result.execSummary:
The defendant Lucas B Lorentz was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Barron County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.notes:
$200.00 cash bond to be applied towards Court costs.
In the event of non-payment of outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant and in favor of restitution victims and governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect all debt.

Huber privileges granted.
Defendant to report to jail by 5:00 p.m. today, October 14, 2015.

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Lucas B Lorentz in court with attorney Ryan Joseph Raymond.  Angela Lynn Beranek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
THIS COVERS 15CM143, 14CM312, 15TR693 and 15TR692. 
15CM143: Defendant pleads guilty to count 1. Court accepts the plea and finds the Defendant guilty. Counts 2 and 3 are dismissed and read-in. 
14CM312: State moves to dismiss. Court grants. 
15TR693 and 15TR692: Dismissed and read-in. 

S. Millermon, Clerk

Argument by Defense.  Defendant addresses Court.

Court relates and orders: 

10 days jail with huber
Court costs - 60 days to pay.
Must report to jail by 5:00 PM
Bond posted to be applied to costs.

Order to Submit DNA Specimen form given to defendant.

Defendant Lucas B Lorentz in court with attorney Ryan Joseph Raymond.  Angela Lynn Beranek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
COVERS 14CM312, 14CM345, 15CM143, 15TR692, 15TR693.
Attorney Raymond relates and requests reset.

State moves to dismiss 14CM345.  
Per 967.055 Court finds that dismissal is in public interest. Court has suppressed evidence obtained.  Court grants 14CM345 Dismissed.  

14CM312, 15CM143, 15TR692, and 15TR693 all reset to 10/14/2015 @ 2:00 p.m.

Defendant Lucas B Lorentz in court with attorney Ryan Joseph Raymond.  Angela Lynn Beranek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
14CM312, 14CM345, 15CM143, 15TR692 and 15TR693 called.  Reset -  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for September 10, 2015 at 02:15 pm.

(clerked by AP)
Defendant Lucas B Lorentz in court with attorney Ryan Joseph Raymond.  Angela Lynn Beranek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

THIS COURT RECORD COVERS 14CM312, 15CM143, 14CM345, 15TR693 AND 15TR692




14CM345: 
3:46  Court relates and gives appearances.
Court relates that she will render decision today as to decision after 6/05/15 motion hearing.  
4:12  Court grants Atty. Raymond's motion and finds not reasonable suspicion to conduct search.  Court suppresses evidence.

All above cases set for plea date 8/26/15 at 2:00 PM.
Bond(s) to continue.

(clerked by AP)
Defendant Lucas B Lorentz in court with attorney Ryan Joseph Raymond.  Angela Lynn Beranek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

THIS COURT RECORD COVERS 14CM345, 14CM312, 15CM143, 15TR693 AND 15TR692

1:31  Court relates and gives appearances.  
Motion to suppress

1:34  Officer Michael Hoff called, sworn, direct by State.  Witness identifies defendant.
1:51  Cross by Atty. Raymond.
2:02  Officer David Hibbard called, sworn, direct by State.  Witness identifies defendant.
2:11  Cross by Atty. Raymond.
2:16  State rests.
2:17  State makes argument and asks that court denies defense' motion.  
2:22  Atty. Raymond makes argument.
2:30  Rebuttal by State.
2:30  Atty. Raymond makes argument.
2:31  Court relates.  Court to review case and render oral decision on 7/17/15.  Court is not requiring briefing.  
2:32  Atty Raymond relates.

All above cases set for plea hearing 7/17/15 at 3:30 PM (oral decision to be given at that time).
Bond(s) to continue in their present form.



  Plea hearing scheduled for July 17, 2015 at 03:30 pm.

Defendant shall be fingerprinted at the Barron County Sheriff's Dept., if not already done.
If represented by the Public Defender and does not have a phone, must contact the Public Defender weekly at 715-537-1191.

Must not operate a motor vehicle without a valid driver's license.

Defendant Lucas B Lorentz in court with attorney John Gerard Hinde.  Angela Lynn Beranek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

THIS COURT RECORD COVERS 15CM143, 15TR692 and 15TR693 

15CM143:  
Plea of NG to all counts.
Bond set.
Plea hearing set.


15TR692 AND 15TR693: 
NG pleas entered.  Both to track with 15CM143.  Plea hearing scheduled for June 5, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
